<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Charau-ka](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1533)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Charau-ka" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=263" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 37</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 18

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
whip +8 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thrown debris +8 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Shrieking Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins. **Frequency** Once per hour; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of its turn, and can use the extra action to Stride or Strike. Due to its loud wailing while in a shrieking frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails all [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks.

**Thrown Weapon Mastery**   When a charau-ka throws a weapon, the weapon gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. When it throws an improvised weapon, it doesn't take the –2 penalty for using an improvised weapon, nor does it take the penalty for using that weapon to make a lethal attack instead of a nonlethal attack

</column>
